str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!
Full, abounding in, complete, completely occupied with. From pletho; replete, or covered over; by analogy, complete.
Leprosy. From the same as lepis; scaliness, i.e. 'leprosy'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
To cleanse, make clean, literally, ceremonially, or spiritually, according to context. From katharos; to cleanse.
